titles: Two sermons, for these who are to come to the table of the Lord With diverse prayers fit for the necessities of the Saincts at diverse occasions. Carefully digested by Mr. Zacharie Boyd, preacher of Gods word, at Glasgovv.
author: Boyd, Zacharie, 1585?-1653.
notes: Imperfect; leaf D3 torn, affecting text; lacks all after leaf I3.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Lord's Supper --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
